model

Class DailyTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.DailyTime
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IDailyTime

    public class DailyTime
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDailyTime
    Implementation of the interface IDailyTime through the usage of a List of elements that represent all the hours of the day.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface model.interfaces.IDailyTime

        FIRST_HOUR, HOURS

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DailyTime()
      It creates a new daily timetable with all available hours, namely in null form.
      DailyTime(IDailyTime dt)
      It creates a new daily timetable by copying the old one using it as a parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(ISubject sub,
                int hour,
                int n)
        Description copied from interface: IDailyTime
        Aggiunge una materia nell'arco di tempo indicato. It adds a subject in the specified time frame.
        Specified by:
        add in interface IDailyTime
        Parameters:
        sub - Subject to be inserted on.
        hour - Lesson starting time.
        n - Number of consecutive hours in which the subject passed as parameter starting from hour is taught.

      • remove

        public void remove(int hour,
                   int n)
        Description copied from interface: IDailyTime
        It removes all courses in the specified time frame, in case of lack of courses it doesn't throw any exception.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface IDailyTime
        Parameters:
        hour - Hour from which starting to remove subjects.
        n - Number of consecutive hours in which removing subjects starting from hour.

      • getSubject

        public java.util.Optional<ISubject> getSubject(int hour)
        Description copied from interface: IDailyTime
        It gives back the course in a specified hour.
        Specified by:
        getSubject in interface IDailyTime
        Parameters:
        hour - Hour in which looking for the subject to be given back.
        Returns:
        The course given in the specified hour. It is used an Optional in order to avoid giving back null Optional in case that there is no course in the specified hour.
